name: Billy Club, Unique
effect:
C
Remove Billy Club from the game [>] Target character gets +3 ATK while in combat with a character with greater cost this turn. At the start of the recovery phase this turn, return Billy Club to play equipped to a non-stunned Daredevil you control.

name: Black Panther, Vibranium Vogue
effect:
C
{Activate} ---> Target character you control can be equipped with up to two equipment this turn. You may put an equipment card with cost 0 from your hand into play equipped to that character.
"This old thing? Little more than a pet project of mine."

name: Blackbird, Unique * SR-73
effect:
Characters you control have flight.
Whenever an [X-Men] character you control attacks, you may ready it. If you do, it can't attack again this turn.

name: Captain America's Shield, Unique * Badge of Courage
effect:
Equip only to Captain America.
When equipped character becomes exhausted for the first time each turn, you may ready him.
Its value is more than just sentimental.

name: Cloak of Levitation, Unique
effect:
C
Exhaust Cloak of Levitation [>] Target character can't attack this turn. Use only during your attack step.
"It's almost as if it's...alive."

name: Dr. Doom, Unholy Arsenal
effect: While Dr. Doom is equipped, plot twists cost your opponents 2 more to play during the combat phase.
"Richards! Fell my power!"

name: Goblin Glider, Ver 2.0
effect:
Equipped character has flight.
Characters defending against equipped character lose and can't have reinforcement.
"I've made some improvements. What do you think?"

name: Hank Pym ~ Giant Man, Big Brain
effect: At the start of the combat phase, draw a card for each equipment in play you recruited this turn.
"With an ego like that, it's a wonder he doesn't stay that size full time."

name: Hawkeye's Bow, Unique
effect: Equipped character has "{Activate}, Discard a card [>] Stun target character with cost 2 or less."
"If you're going to borrow the name, you might as well take the bow."

name: Iron Man - Shiny Knight
effect: Whenever an equipped character you control becomes stunned by an opposing character, draw a card.
" Maya, please. I'm trying to concentrate. "

name: Man and Machine
effect:
To play, KO an equipment with cost X equipped to a character you control.
Search your deck for an equipment card with cost X or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand or into play equipped to that character.

name: Mandroid Armor, Army
effect:
Equip only to an Army character.
Equipped character gets +2 / +2.

name: Mjolnir - Unique / Hammer of the Gods
effect:
Equipped character gains the name Thor.

Whenever equipped character becomes exhausted, target player loses 2 endurance.

  • Collector Number: MEQ-021
  • Rarity: R
  • Card Type: Equipment
  • Recruit or Threshold Cost: 0
Whenever equipped character becomes exhausted, target player loses 2 endurance.

name: Mr. Fantastic, Father of Invention
effect:
Equipment cards cost you 1 less to recruit.
Revealed character and equipment cards in your resource row have reservist.
"Hmm, failure. Perhaps less thingamajig and more whatsit?"

name: Punisher, Loaded for Bear
effect: Whenever an unequipped character becomes stunned, KO it.
In a war without end, you're going to need plenty of ammo.

name: Quinjet - Mighty Machine
effect:
Characters adjacent to equipped character have flight and reinforcement.

Pay 1 endurace >>> Move any number of characters you control.

  • Collector Number: MEQ-022
  • Rarity: C
  • Card Type: Equipment
  • Recruit or Threshold Cost: 0
Pay 1 endurace >>> Move any number of characters you control.

name: Silver Centurion Armor - Unique
effect:
Equip only to Iron Man.

Equipped character gets +1 ATK for each card in your hand.

  • Collector Number: MEQ-024
  • Rarity: C
  • Card Type: Equipment
  • Recruit or Threshold Cost: 0
  • Artist: Mark Bright
Equipped character gets +1 ATK for each card in your hand.

name: Stormbreaker - Unique
effect:
Equip only to an Alpha Flight or Asgardians character.

Whenever equipped character stuns an opposing defender, you may return Stormbreaker to its owner's hand. If you do, turn target resource face down.

  • Collector Number: MEQ-020
  • Rarity: U
  • Card Type: Equipment
  • Recruit or Threshold Cost: 0
Whenever equipped character stuns an opposing defender, you may return Stormbreaker to its owner's hand. If you do, turn target resource face down.

name: The Ten Rings
effect:
A deck can have up to ten cards named The Ten Rings.
Equipped character can be equipped with any number of The Ten Rings.
Equipped character gets +1 / +1.

name: The Workshop
effect:
Whenever an equipment card with cost 1 or more enters your KO'd pile from play, put a repair counter on The Workshop.
Remove X repair counters [>] Gain X resource points. Spend these points only to recruit equipment. Use only during your recruit step.
"I didn't spend the whole day in here. I went out for lunch. I promise."

name: Time Platform, Unique * Timeslip Module
effect:
Equip only to Dr. Doom.
When Time Platform enters play, note each player's endurance total.
At the start of the recovery phase, you may remove Time Platform from the game. If you do, each player's endurance becomes its noted total.

name: Vibranium Shield - Unique
effect:
Equip only to an Alpha Flight or Avengers character.

Equipped character gets +2 DEF>

Return Vibranium Shield to its owner's hand >>> Equipped character gets +2 ATK this attack.

  • Collector Number: MEQ-019
  • Rarity: C
  • Card Type: Equipment
  • Recruit or Threshold Cost: 0

Equipped character gets +2 DEF>

Return Vibranium Shield to its owner's hand >>> Equipped character gets +2 ATK this attack.

  • Collector Number: MEQ-019
  • Rarity: C
  • Card Type: Equipment
  • Recruit or Threshold Cost: 0
Return Vibranium Shield to its owner's hand >>> Equipped character gets +2 ATK this attack.

name: War Machine Armor, Unique
effect:
Equip only to an [Avengers] or [SHIELD] character.
Equipped character has "{Activate}, Discard your hand [>] Each opponent loses X endurance, stuns a non-stunned character he controls with cost X or less, and replaces X resources he controls, where X is equipped character's cost. Use only during your attack step."

name: Web-Shooters, Spit and Bubble Gum
effect: Equipped character has "{Activate}, Discard a card [>] Exhaust target character with cost less than equipped character's cost."
"Don't lose it. Those things are expensive."
